website_summaries.verdict: Different shapes of cleats on the bottom of the shoe will help with traction in different field conditions.
pros: Will give you a really nice feel for the ball through the mesh upper fabric in these shoes
Comfortable collar area in the top of the shoe
Includes both round and triangle shaped cleats to help you deal with different field conditions and to give you the ability to quickly change directions
cons: Style and colors of the shoe will not appeal to everyone

customer_reviews.title: It's a comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: I was quite excited when my daughter said she loved these cleats! I thought it's a win win. Not too expensive, comfortable, and well maid. However, these cleats don't breathe and after a couple of months of my daughter's playing in them 3-5 times a week, I'm ready to burn them. By far, the most stinkiest experience in all the years both of my kids played soccer. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ludmila Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy back
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks exactly as pictured. The one complaint I would have is that my daughter wore them for about a month or so, and the back is already tearing apart. They are not as well made or durable as other Adidas cleats. We will not buy this style again.
customer_reviews.author: rtjt3

customer_reviews.title: Good ankle support
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 12 year old daughter. She loves the fit and look of these shoes. She particularly likes the fabric lining of the ankle area. It keeps her socks from slipping down into the shoe and avoids blisters as well. Good ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Barry N Peavey

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend these shoes to anyone
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awful. They don’t fit as expected, and hurt my feet. I have huge blisters from wearing them not even a week, and are still not healed. I would not recommend these shoes to anyone. There is hard plastic around the ankle of the shoe which causes rubbing and discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: we got this for my daughter she really like it and we got it right on time :)
customer_reviews.author: Yara Swain

customer_reviews.title: Light, comfortable cleat
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable. Didn't take any time to break them in. We would absolutely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Newland

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them and says they're comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Well made shoe. My daughter loves them and says they're comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn N

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my daughter, she really likes them and they fit her well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: like many Adidas products these days, the shoes are super narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Hewhosurfs

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. The cleats have a grippy texture on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. The cleats have a grippy texture on the outside that’s good for dribbling. Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Stevens

customer_reviews.title: RUNS SMALL!
customer_reviews.text: I want to return it but they won't let me!
customer_reviews.author: william prettyman

product_meta.title: adidas Women's Nemeziz 17.3 FG W Soccer Shoe, Trace Blue/Red Zest/Core Black, 10 M US
product_meta.description: Defy opponents. Unleash agility that leaves them flat-footed and wide-eyed. Unpredictable and unruly, Nemesis tears up the field. A soft touch lets you control the ball and dominate the field in these women's soccer cleats with a flexible AGILITY MESH upper. Designed for firm ground.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Responsive touch and optimum ball control out of the box with innovative textile AGILITY MESH
Secure lockdown and ankle stability with a DUAL LOCK COLLAR
